column4: is it possible to give different users different /tmp directories?
why ?
just for better cleaning up issues
cleaning up what ? actually if you go to /tmp there should be sub dirs with names ...
i got different users on the machine and it makes conflicts because of some gnomefiles located in /tmp ;(
and why you need to delete them ?
sorry i mixed something no deletion is to be made
ok ..
i just had 2 users and when i log in with the first one i get a gnome-panel error that the second user got a lock on it
type users ... how many names do you see ?
or who
the users aren't logged in at the same time
can't be ... you only see your name when you do who ?
i don't know for sure i am asking this for another person but he said that they weren't logged in at the same time
then ask him to do who .. at least come up with something .. we will see how things go
the two accounts were just sharing some files
ok thx
he wanted to check the symlinks so if anything is mixed up with them
really .. so does he have two users logged in or just one user ? and how do they share a file ?
sry he is still not chatting with me but i will ask him :) thx
k
